subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Scotty Hopson’s fadeaway jumper with 21 seconds left gave No. 14 Tennessee a 61-60 victory over Florida, the Volunteers’ sixth straight against the Gators.
snippet: Scotty Hopson’s fadeaway jumper with 21 seconds left gave No. 14 Tennessee a 61-60 victory over Florida, the Volunteers’ sixth straight against the Gators.
